title: GERVONTA DAVIS: The Truth About Floyd Mayweather and Wanting Ryan Garcia
description:
A special episode drop of I AM ATHLETE featuring Gervonta "Tank" Davis, a legend with hosts Brandon Marshall, Chad Ochocinco Johnson, and  Adam Caparell, a journalist formerly with Complex.  

We are working on a new additional series of I Am Athlete. This potential series can give us an opportunity to sit down with MORE legends in a candid and uncensored environment.  

What should we call it? IAA (I Am Athlete) Straight forward , Straight Up, No Cap, Unfiltered, OFFset, UNcut, The Real, NOW, WarmUp, Raw 1stCut, Uncensored, or Ocho's idea... IAA B****

Watch Gervonta's fight vs. Rolando Romero on May 28th!!!
Let us know what you think and Comment some title ideas below ⬇️ 

SUBSCRIBE and Follow I AM ATHLETE:
Official Site: https://iamathletetv.com/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/iamathlete
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IAMATHLETEpod
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iamathlete/?hl=en
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@iamathlete_podcast
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/i-am-athlete
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (I AM ATHLETE & SiriusXM)
